SQLs.SQL: select gf.fuwujgbh, gf.fuwujgmc, gz.mingcheng from GY_ZD_SHENGSHIQX_QC gz left join GY_FUWUJG gf on gz.DAIMA = gf.fuwujgbh where 1=1 and gf.fuwujgbh is not null and gf.dizhibm = @dizhibm and gf.fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @单位名称 order by gf.fuwujgbh asc @Pager

select dr.visitunitcode fuwujgbh, count(*) huochanzs, sum(case when nr.babysex=1 then 1 else 0 end) huochannan, sum(case when nr.babysex=2 then 1 else 0 end) huochannv, sum(case when nr.babysex!=1 and nr.babysex!=2 then 1 else 0 end)huochanbm from cdh_newbornrecord nr left join cdh_deliveryrecord dr on nr.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh where nr.outcomeofbirth = 1 and dr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and dr.tianbiaosj < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and dr.visitunitcode in ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and fuwujgbh is not null and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @单位名称 order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) group by dr.visitunitcode

select d.entryunitcode as fuwujgbh, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 then 1 else 0 end) babys from perinataldeathcase d where d.mobileflag = 1 and d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and d.entryunitcode in ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and fuwujgbh is not null and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) group by d.entryunitcode

select d.entryunitcode as fuwujgbh, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25) < 1 then 1 else 0 end) yiners, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25) >= 1 then 1 else 0 end) wusuidy1, count(*) wusuisw from underfiveyearsdeathcase d where d.mobileflag = 1 and d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and d.entryunitcode in ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and fuwujgbh is not null and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) group by d.entryunitcode order by d.entryunitcode asc

select dr.visitunitcode fuwujgbh, count(*) huochanzsother, sum(case when nr.babysex=1 then 1 else 0 end) huochannanother, sum(case when nr.babysex=2 then 1 else 0 end) huochannvother, sum(case when nr.babysex!=1 and nr.babysex!=2 then 1 else 0 end)huochanbmother from cdh_newbornrecord nr left join cdh_deliveryrecord dr on nr.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join cdh_pregnantinfo pi on pi.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh where nr.outcomeofbirth = 1 and pi.ownerarea != 1 and dr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and dr.tianbiaosj < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and dr.visitunitcode in ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and fuwujgbh is not null and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) group by dr.visitunitcode order by dr.visitunitcode asc

select d.entryunitcode as fuwujgbh, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 then 1 else 0 end) babysother from perinataldeathcase d where d.mobileflag != 1 and d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and d.entryunitcode in ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and fuwujgbh is not null and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) group by d.entryunitcode

select d.entryunitcode as fuwujgbh, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25) < 1 then 1 else 0 end) yinersother, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25) >= 1 then 1 else 0 end) wusuidy1other, count(*) wusuiswother from underfiveyearsdeathcase d where d.mobileflag != 1 and d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and d.entryunitcode in ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and fuwujgbh is not null and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) group by d.entryunitcode order by d.entryunitcode asc

Source.CountSQL: select count(*) from GY_ZD_SHENGSHIQX_QC gz left join GY_FUWUJG gf on gz.DAIMA = gf.fuwujgbh where 1=1 and fuwujgbh is not null and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @单位名称
